entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
